product_title: COCO MADEMOISELLE EAU DE PARFUM INTENSE
product_description:
What it is: An intense new facet of the COCO MADEMOISELLE personality emerges to forge a powerful, deep, addictive fragrance that is irresistible in every way.
Fragrance story: An extreme, luminous and deep concentration of patchouli infuses COCO MADEMOISELLE EAU DE PARFUM INTENSE with a voluptuous dimension. The warm, soft and feminine amber accord with an intoxicating blend of tonka bean and vanilla from Madagascar wraps the scent in sensuality. It comes presented in a spray bottle for effortless application on skin or clothing.
- 3.4 oz.
- Made in France
Item # 5575632
